meanings.sent1: Many people wonder about afterlives and what happens after we die.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, afterlives are thought to be peaceful realms beyond our world.
meanings.sent3: At the spooky Halloween party, the ghost decorations joked about their afterlives.
meanings.sent4: The concept of afterlives can be like a mysterious door waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: Legends often speak of afterlives filled with eternal happiness or punishment.

meanings.definition: The different states of existence that are believed to follow death.
meanings.sent1: Ancient civilizations had diverse beliefs about afterlives and the journey of the soul.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the various myths and legends surrounding afterlives across different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The afterlives in science fiction movies always involve futuristic technology and alien worlds.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the afterlives of our imagination can lead to fascinating philosophical discussions.
meanings.sent5: The idea of afterlives can spark curiosity about what lies beyond our current life.
